paragraphs.text:
%flink.conf

FLINK_HOME /opt/flink
flink.execution.mode remote
flink.execution.remote.host	jobmanager
flink.execution.remote.port 8081
execution.checkpointing.interval 30000
state.backend rocksdb
state.checkpoints.dir hdfs://namenode:8020/flink-checkpoints
state.savepoints.dir hdfs://namenode:8020/flink-savepoints
state.backend.incremental true
taskmanager.network.blocking-shuffle.type mmap
taskmanager.network.blocking-shuffle.compression.enabled true
jobmanager.archive.fs.dir hdfs://completed-jobs
cluster.evenly-spread-out-slots true
heartbeat.timeout 180000
akka.framesize 251658240b
classloader.check-leaked-classloader false

%flink.ssql(type=single,jobName="Full sync 15 tables(ods_mysql_base_category_info)",parallelism=1)
drop temporary table if exists ods_mysql_base_category_info;
create temporary table if not exists ods_mysql_base_category_info (
    id            bigint       not null  comment '编号',
    category_name varchar(200) null comment '分类名称',
    create_time   timestamp     null comment '创建时间',
    update_time   timestamp     null comment '更新时间',
    deleted       varchar(2)   null comment '是否删除',
    primary key(id) not enforced
) with (
    'connector' = 'mysql-cdc',
    'hostname' = 'mysql',
    'port' = '3306',
    'username' = 'root',
    'password' = 'mysql123457',
    'database-name' = 'edu',
    'table-name' = 'base_category_info'
);

drop table if exists ods_pm_base_category_info;
create table if not exists ods_pm_base_category_info
with (
    'changelog-producer' = 'input',
    'bucket' = '1'
) like ods_mysql_base_category_info (
    EXCLUDING ALL
);
insert into ods_pm_base_category_info 
select id, category_name, create_time, update_time, deleted 
from ods_mysql_base_category_info

%flink.ssql(type=single,jobName="Full sync 15 tables(ods_mysql_cart_info)",parallelism=1)
drop temporary table if exists ods_mysql_cart_info;
create temporary table if not exists ods_mysql_cart_info (
    id          bigint  comment '编号',
    user_id     bigint         null comment '用户id',
    course_id   bigint         null comment '课程id',
    course_name varchar(200)   null comment 'sku名称 (冗余)',
    cart_price  decimal(10, 2) null comment '放入购物车时价格',
    img_url     varchar(200)   null comment '图片文件',
    session_id  varchar(200)   null comment '会话id',
    create_time timestamp       null comment '创建时间',
    update_time timestamp       null comment '修改时间',
    deleted     varchar(2)     null,
    sold        varchar(2)     null comment '是否已售',
    primary key(id) not enforced
) with (
    'connector' = 'mysql-cdc',
    'hostname' = 'mysql',
    'port' = '3306',
    'username' = 'root',
    'password' = 'mysql123457',
    'database-name' = 'edu',
    'table-name' = 'cart_info'
);

drop table if exists ods_pm_cart_info;
create table if not exists ods_pm_cart_info
with (
    'changelog-producer' = 'input',
    'bucket' = '1'
) like ods_mysql_cart_info (
    EXCLUDING ALL
);
insert into ods_pm_cart_info
select id, user_id, course_id, course_name, cart_price, img_url, session_id, create_time, update_time, deleted, sold
from ods_mysql_cart_info;

paragraphs.title: Full sync 15 tables(ods_mysql_video_info)
paragraphs.text:
%flink.ssql(type=single,jobName="Full sync 15 tables(ods_mysql_video_info)",parallelism=1)
drop temporary table if exists ods_mysql_video_info;
create temporary table if not exists ods_mysql_video_info (
    id              bigint not null comment '编号',
    video_name      varchar(200)  null comment '视频名称',
    during_sec      bigint        null comment '时长',
    video_status    varchar(4000) null comment '状态 未上传，上传中，上传完',
    video_size      bigint        null comment '大小',
    video_url       varchar(500)  null comment '视频存储路径',
    video_source_id varchar(200)  null comment '云端资源编号',
    version_id      bigint        null comment '版本号',
    chapter_id      bigint        null comment '章节id',
    course_id       bigint        null comment '课程id',
    publisher_id    bigint        null comment '发布者id',
    create_time     timestamp      null comment '创建时间',
    update_time     timestamp      null comment '更新时间',
    deleted         varchar(2)    null comment '是否删除',
    primary key(id) not enforced
) with (
    'connector' = 'mysql-cdc',
    'hostname' = 'mysql',
    'port' = '3306',
    'username' = 'root',
    'password' = 'mysql123457',
    'database-name' = 'edu',
    'table-name' = 'video_info'
);

drop table if exists ods_pm_video_info;
create table if not exists ods_pm_video_info
with (
    'changelog-producer' = 'input',
    'bucket' = '1'
) like ods_mysql_video_info (
    EXCLUDING ALL
);
insert into ods_pm_video_info
select id, video_name, during_sec, video_status, video_size, video_url, video_source_id, version_id,
                        chapter_id, course_id, publisher_id, create_time, update_time, deleted
from ods_mysql_video_info;
